column5: Measure(s) foreseen to reach compliance with Article 3 (collecting systems and IAS)
column6: Date or expected date for completion of preparatory measures for the  collecting system or IAS (planning, design, procurement, consents as required at MS level, etc)
column7: Start date or expected start date for works on the collecting systems or IAS
column8: Expected date of completion of the collecting system or IAS works
column9: Forecast investment cost for the collecting system or IAS (as in the national plan)
column10: Name of EU fund planned to be used to complete the collecting system or IAS  (if any)
column11: Amount of (planned)  EU funds likely to be requested to complete the collecting system or IAS  (if any)
column12: Any relevant comment on  collecting system or IAS

column4: neustrezna opremljenost z javno kanalizacijo in/ali IAS
